title: Latest updates: Nottinghamshire Live on Tuesday 14 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: canal street closed in one direction for gas works .
mp anna soubry abstained in brexit bill vote .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for nottinghamshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: hunt group consider appeal against conviction
text: we 've been informed the three members of the grove and rufford hunt are seeking legal advice and considering appealing against today 's decision at mansfield magistrates ' court .
campaign group countryside alliance said they were `` disappointed '' by the verdict .
a spokesman said : `` they had nothing to hide and were acting lawfully within the hunting act legislation .
they will now take legal advice and may very well appeal the decision at a higher court . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: weather : getting cloudier tonight
text: some clear spells for a time this evening , but we 'll see more in the way of cloud building overnight .
the cloud could be thick enough to produce the odd spot of light rain .
we 'll also see some patches of mist/hill fog developing .
minimum temperature : 8c ( 46f )
author: Lucy Martin
BBC Weather

documents.title: duchess gives approval to wash bag scheme
text: the duchess of cornwall has been in nottingham today to give her seal of approval to a scheme which helps rape victims .
the scheme , which has been run by boots for a few months , gives wash bags full of toiletries to victims of sexual attacks who often can not shower for hours afterwards .
the duchess met with volunteers who have filled thousands of the bags and also spoke to a rape victim who had used one of them .

manager of the sexual assault referral centre in nottingham said : `` sometimes they [ victims ] are asked not to wash for a number of hours while we complete the forensic medical examinations and then being able to go and have a shower with these beautiful products in the wash bag i think is really important . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: sheridan 's notts sacking appeal 'astonishing '
text: sport has more on the reaction from notts county chairman alan hardy to news that former manager john sheridan is appealing against his sacking .
sheridan was sacked after he used foul and abusive language towards the referee and fourth official during the magpies ' game against wycombe in december .
responding to news of the appeal , mr hardy said : `` i am not prepared to tolerate any member of my staff abusing referees and officials in this manner .
`` the conduct shown by mr sheridan towards the match officials in this instance was nothing short of scandalous . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: have you got the dino factor ?
text: obsessed with dinosaurs and looking for a new job ?
wollaton hall is looking for someone to dress up as a sinraptor and roam around nottingham between now and october .
it 's all part of the dinosaurs of china exhibition that 's coming to wollaton hall in july .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: delays expected on buses tonight
text: the buses are also affected by the closure of canal street .
as we enter the afternoon rush hour , delays expected on most services due to the emergency gas works on canal street .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: diversions to stay in place tonight
text: here 's a helpful map from the city council to show you the diversion and how you can access trent street while canal street is shut .
national grid emergency gas works on canal st : road closed westbound from london rd roundabout to ease traffic flow .
diversions in place
incidently this is the proposed traffic strategy route for broad marsh dev
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid help its going to take longer to escape from this hell
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: canal street to stay close until 'at least the morning '
text: meanwhile , national grid has said canal street will stay closed until at least tomorrow morning .
a spokeswoman told us some of the repairs to the leaking gas pipe have been done and the others are being finished off at the moment .
she said they will then test the pipes again tomorrow to make sure everything is fixed before they can reopen the road .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: council halting roadworks during canal street closure
text: the city council has announced it is halting all other roadworks in nottingham city centre while canal street is shut in order to help with the traffic flow .

councillor nick mcdonald said the council was informed of the emergency works on sunday night and while there was `` nothing they can do to prevent them '' they were clearly `` causing a major disruption '' .
he added : `` we understand that these are emergency works that have to be done and safety must be the priority where gas lines are concerned .
`` but questions have to be asked about why this could n't be resolved first time round . ''
this is the second time this year emergency gas works on canal street have caused traffic disruption .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: hunt members showed 'disregard ' for law , say police
text: speaking after the trial of the hunt members at mansfield magistrates ' court , sgt matt scott from nottinghamshire police said the case shows the trio had `` total disregard for the law '' .
he said : `` the three defendants who appeared today acted with complete impunity .
`` ultimately the law is there for everybody to observe and they are no different . ''
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: hardy furious at dismissal appeal
text: notts chairman alan hardy says he is `` astonished '' john sheridan has appealed his dismissal .

he said in a statement issued this afternoon , sheridan 's conduct shown to officials was `` scandalous '' and added : `` sheridan clearly believes this industrial language is used in everyday workplaces .
`` not in my place of work it 's not . ''
it was revealed in january that sheridan was sacked by the club for gross misconduct after a verbal outburst in which he used offensive language and threatened officials .
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: three hunt members fined
text: all three members of the grove and rufford hunt were convicted of hunting a mammal with dogs and fined at mansfield magistrates ' court .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : footage of an illegal fox hunt
text: here 's the footage we spoke about earlier of the illegal fox hunt in laneham which was captured by a birdwatcher .
it was used in the trial of the three hunt members at mansfield magistrates ' court .
the league against cruel sports said this was the first case they were aware of where footage from members of the public - rather than hunt monitors - was used to secure a conviction .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: did someone say cheese ?
text: fancy a brieyonce or a celine dijon ?
a cafe specialising in trendy cheese toasties or grilled cheese sandwiches has popped up in sneinton market .
forty of the 46 units have now been let in the refurbished market and in the last year a circus school , art installations and a gin distiller have also moved in .
author: Hayley Compton
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: eyewitness described 'mass ' of dogs chasing fox
text: during the trial the court heard that on 30 january last year , the grove and rufford hunt met at the bees knees pub in laneham , nottinghamshire for a day 's trail hunting .
the prosecution said the trails laid for the hounds were a ruse , and the hunt 's real intent was illegally to hunt foxes .
peter white was a trail layer among the group and a volunteer , paul larby , was huntsman and employed by the hunt and jane wright took the role of 'whipper in ' .
philip palmer was out birdwatching with his partner pauline hogg and they asked to take photos of the hunt .
he described to the court how he saw a fox run into another field chased by a `` mass '' of 45 hounds .
mr palmer said this happened in view of members of the hunt and he never heard shouts to call the dogs off .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: member of public shot footage of hunt
text: the hunting group 's case is unusual in that it was brought using footage shot by members of the public , not hunt investigators .
author: Simon Hare
BBC Inside Out East Midlands

documents.title: still problems with train ticket machines
text: still problems with train ticket machines

documents.title: manager appointments a 'big day in the east midlands '
text: ahead of the east midlands derby on saturday , bbc sport 's chief football writer phil mcnulty tweets
big day in the east midlands as gary rowett takes over at @ twitterid and mark warburton at @ twitterid - two great clubs in need of revival .
not to mention shakespear 's first official game
correct .
and one i am really looking forward to being at .
even bigger day in worcestershire , where @ twitterid turns 60 and celebrates with a boozy mixed zone .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new managers for forest and rams at derby
text: mark warburton has also managed brentford , joining in 2013 before leading them to promotion to the .
championship , then a play-off finish the following season .
his first match in charge will be a massive east midlands derby against derby county at the city ground on saturday .
forest are just two points above the relegation zone and the rams also have a new man in charge after they appointed gary rowett earlier today .
author: Christian Hewgill
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: trio guilty of hunting fox with dogs
text: three members of a nottinghamshire hunt have been found guilty of hunting a fox with dogs .
they are members of the grove and rufford hunt and the fox was killed in january last year .
they are 58-year-old paul larby , 57-year-old peter white and jane wright who is 63 .
they were found guilty after a trial at mansfield magisrates ' court .
author: Simon Ward
East Midlands Today Reporter

documents.title: forest appoint warburton as manager
text: there 's more from bbc sport on forest 's appointment of former rangers boss mark warburton .
he 's been out of work since .
leaving rangers on 10 february .
warburton is joined at the city ground by ex-scotland international defender david weir , who was assistant manager at rangers .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: how to get to trent road with road closure
text: we had a query earlier from a motorist wanting to know how people can get to trent street and station street with one side of canal street being closed .
you can in fact turn right from the eastbound side .
you normally ca n't do that but there 's an exception while the emergency gas works take place .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: warburton confirmed as reds manager
text: here 's the confirmation from forest of warburton 's appointment .
the 54-year-old has signed a two-and-a-half contract after leaving glasgow rangers last month .
he joined rangers in june 2015 and guided them to the scottish championship and well as the scottish challenge cup .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: breakingnew forest manager announced
text: forest owner fawaz al hasawi has tweeted to confirm the appointment of mark warburton as the new manager .
i 'm delighted to welcome mark warburton who has joined as our new manager # nffc
cheers fawaz
did you pull the plug on the jjm deal for the greeks and yourself ?
or the best interests of the club ?
good appointment that is fawaz , keep re structuring and lets get the club to safety .
we will not be safe until we have new owners .
you know , like ones who attend games ?
could n't careless if they attend or not , this is a good appointment for the club , owners always divide opinions
not attending shows contempt for the club .
if he 's not interested he should go .
good appt until he sacks
i personally think its better he stays away , some fans want blood
exactly .
how can he attend with so many stupid fans
the stupid ones are those that still blindly support him after 5 years of mismanagement
i think that is a great appointment fawaz a manager who likes to play football with a lot of heart .
@ twitterid i 'll give him 6 months .
thought @ twitterid was manager til end of season ?
what of gb and jack ?
you should publicly thank them and rob page , they did a tough job at a tough time .
recognise their work
i 'm delighted too
well done on the appointment
he is the right man even if we get relegated .
i 'm confident we 'll survive and push on next season # coyr # nffc
let 's now back our manager , and set for the premiership
thanks chairman , your £ 2000000+ spend to run the club every month , is appreciated
author: BBC Nottingham Sport

documents.title: stead says he would 've left notts
text: jon stead has told bbc radio nottingham he 'd probably have left meadow lane for the united states in january had kevin nolan not taken over .
he said `` it was a frustrating place to be .
the previous manager made it clear to everyone they were available to leave .
`` the new gaffer said i ca n't let you go anywhere and i totally understood that . ''
author: Christian Hewgill
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: watch : elise christie talks to bbc sport
text: elise christie is live on facebook right now .
send in your questions to her .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: christie : 'i never imagined winning three golds '
text: after becoming a triple world champion at the weekend , nottingham-based speed skater elise christie has been telling me just how shocked she is this morning .
she said : i ca n't describe what it feels like .
i wanted gold but never expected to win three in one weekend ! ''
author: Christian Hewgill
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: your views : traffic problems are a taste of the future
text: get used to today 's traffic problems , they will become permanent soon !

documents.title: travel : heavy traffic around the city
text: it 's been a busy rush hour this morning with traffic on pretty much every road around the city .
this was the situation five minutes ago with red meaning very slow traffic .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: train passengers warned ticket machines are broken
text: attention rail travellers - east midlands trains says a fault means its machines are n't able to sell or print out tickets this morning but passengers can purchase them on board or travel with their reference number .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: national grid apologises for delays
text: sara wilcox from national grid told bbc radio nottingham last night they appreciate people will be frustrated with the canal street closure this morning but the repairs needed to be made .
she said : `` for the safety of everybody we need to get this pipe fixed and get this road relayed and everybody moving . ''
the road was shut this morning to allow engineers to dig up more of the road to repair a leaking gas pipe near the trent street junction .
ms wilcox said while relaying the entire pipe would be the best solution , that was a `` major job '' taking months of planning and likely to cause bigger disruption .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: drone racing arena opens in nottingham
text: the uk 's first drone arena has opened in nottingham .
boss sam shaw said he wants to make drone racing as popular as football and for people to watch it as a sport from their own homes .
ukds racing say they are hoping to reconfigure the nottingham site each month to `` keep pilots on their toes '' .
and it 's hoped to open more of these arenas around the country .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : today 's weather forecast
text: a mainly dry day with a few sunny spells .
feeling mild too , especially in the sunshine .
maximum temperature 16c ( 61f )
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: queuing traffic caused by closure
text: there is also congestion on lower parliament street and pennyfoot street because of the closure .
inbound traffic queuing back onto mansfield rd due to congestion on huntingdon st related to canal st closure .
wishful thinking .
its queuing back past woodthorpe drive in sherwood

documents.title: nottingham motorists frustrated with road closure
text: canal street in nottingham is closed in one direction from the london road roundabout this morning
how can you get access to trent street , off canal street if you need to access station street for work ?
avoid at all costs , esp if approaching from the east of the city .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: canal street closed this morning
text: the closure of canal street from the london road roundabout has taken a few motorists by surprise this morning .
the road has been closed this morning to alleviate the traffic problems of yesterday after one lane was closed for emergency gas works to take place .
diversions are in place and canal street is still open eastbound .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's updates
text: hello and welcome to today 's news , travel and sport for nottinghamshire .
we 'll have more details today on the work that is happening on canal street and details of drone racing in nottingham .
author: Sandish Shoker
BBC News Online
